itemDesc: A tantalizing mix of crispy lettuce, grilled chicken, bacon, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing. Deliciously satisfying.
Delicious omelette made with fluffy eggs, filled with your choice of ingredients such as cheese, ham, and vegetables. Served hot.
Our veg soup is a hearty and flavorful blend of fresh vegetables, herbs, and spices, perfect for a healthy and satisfying meal.
